blogPost.title: What is it like to write/direct/produce a movie? @KentMoran, actor, filmmaker, and business owner shares his experience, "Intense, amazing, fun, stressful, educational, emotional, and more all at once." https://t.co/LfMWFJ8i0u https://t.co/o3jgq2nV5h
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 映画の脚本・監督・プロデュースってどんな感じ？俳優、映画監督、会社経営者の@KentMoranが、「強烈、驚き、楽しみ、ストレス、教育、感情、その他を一度に味わう」体験を語る。https://t.co/LfMWFJ8i0u https://t.co/o3jgq2nV5h
写作/导演/制作一部电影是什么感觉？@KentMoran，演员、电影制作人和企业主，分享了他的经验，"紧张、惊奇、有趣、有压力、有教育意义、有感情，同时还有更多。" https://t.co/LfMWFJ8i0u https://t.co/o3jgq2nV5h
寫作/導演/製作一部電影是什麼感覺？@KentMoran，演員、電影製作人和企業主，分享了他的經驗，"緊張、驚奇、有趣、有壓力、有教育意義、有感情，同時還有更多。" https://t.co/LfMWFJ8i0u https://t.co/o3jgq2nV5h

previous.title: What progress has been made around climate change? Emma Varvaloucas (@heyemmavarv), host of What Could Go Right? podcast, shares data based insights here: https://t.co/L215VbduPy https://t.co/t4e8XXDkFt

localize.full_text: 気候変動をめぐる進展は？What Could Go Right?ポッドキャストのホスト、エマ・ヴァルヴァルーカス（@heyemmmavarv）が、データに基づく洞察をここで共有します： https://t.co/L215VbduPy https://t.co/t4e8XXDkFt
围绕气候变化取得了哪些进展？What Could Go Right? 播客的主持人Emma Varvaloucas（@heyemmavarv）在此分享基于数据的见解：https://t.co/L215VbduPy https://t.co/t4e8XXDkFt
圍繞氣候變化取得了哪些進展？What Could Go Right? 播客的主持人Emma Varvaloucas（@heyemmavarv）在此分享基於數據的見解：https://t.co/L215VbduPy https://t.co/t4e8XXDkFt
